name: Objects in Space: Extending MUD Into the EVE Universe
description: In this session, we will discuss CCP Games's forthcoming Smart Object Frameworkâ€”a MUD-based development framework and abstraction layer designed for defining and interfacing with the digital physics of the EVE Universe. We'll explore the advantages and trade-offs associated with constructing a maximally extensible and composable system while ensuring a secure environment and well-defined set of supported behaviors for interactions within the EVE Universe.

speakers.name: Terry Wilkinson
speakers.bio: Terry Wilkinson is principal blockchain engineer at CCP Games, where he is working on the research, development, and design of components for its upcoming AAA blockchain game, Project Awakening.
